text: Start of a Sprint: The Sprint Planning Meeting = Regular meeting that kicks off a sprint (lasts 1-4 hours) = Goal: Establish a shared understanding and commitment among the Scrum team regarding the work to be accomplished during the upcoming sprint = Agenda 1. Reviewing the Product Backlog (PO + Dev team) 2. Clarifying User Stories (PO, Stakeholders, Dev team) 3. Estimating User Stories (Dev team) 4. Selecting User Stories for the Sprint (Dev team + PO) 5. Creating the Sprint Backlog (PO + Dev team) 6. Planning for the Sprint (Dev team)
